How expressions are evaluated

Expressions enclosed in parentheses will be evaluated before being used further in the formula.

l Spaces are ignored unless they appear in one of the following:

l Real-time variable labels

l Click’n Link codes

l Database constants

l Function names (for example IF)

l Operators (for example < =)

Operations are performed in the following order:

l Negation

l Exponentiation

l Multiplication and division

l Addition and subtraction

l Comparison

Operators having the same precedence, for example addition and subtraction, are evaluated from left to right.
